My Internet Corner

yo

Singapore

3 months in the little red dot.

My third internship took me to the island of Singapore. Living there, I felt a sense of familiarity in culture, food and behaviour. In my household, mixing languages was a result of immigration and assimilation, but the melding of east and west seemed be a norm in this nation. Below are some photo collections of my time in Singapore.

Wandering aimlessly in Emerald Hill Street A mosaic of lights in Arab street. Strolling through Katong the Evening Markets of Singapore’s Arab quarter Local Fauna Sunrise in the Marina the Heart of Singaporean Mail. a Hungry Macaque. Shophouses and their Behinds. Chinatown’s Golden Hour. Goodbye Dinner with the Edenspiekermann gang Mid-afternoon Fish Ball Noodles. Happy Hour in Haji
